title: Resizing Client window?
body:
Hi all,

First post, glad to be a part of the LCU, just finished installing the client! Everything looks great, I like the clean look.

One of the first things I tried to do was click on the corner of the window, and drag it out to make it closer to fullscreen... I was quite surprised when I couldn't, just like in Ye Olde Client! 

Anwyays, I did a quick search on the forum here, I did a quick search here and found that only a few people have mentioned it - so I thought I'd add to that. I'd love to be able to resize the client window - and that's before discussion regarding a maximise option and the messages fitting better comes in to the equation!

Hopefully we can get a bit of discussion going on about it.

Cheers,

replies.body: Agreed, I literally just finished downloading and tried that and it didn't work. Surprised this wasn't implemented seems so simple!

It was in the latest changelogs if you have read it. It says... "Bigger (or smaller) is betterAdded ability to increase and decrease window size, by using the keystroke combinations ctrl + or ctrl - (ctrl 0 will restore the client to the default size)."

When you resize it make it fit your screen and your taskbar disappears and it looks awesome.
i think it is glithced at the moment they are trying to fix it at the moment
